import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{SunIcon,MoonIcon}from'@heroicons/react/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[theme,setTheme]=useState(localStorage.getItem('theme')||'light');const navigate=useNavigate();// Toggle theme and store in local storage
const toggleTheme=()=>{const newTheme=theme==='light'?'dark':'light';setTheme(newTheme);localStorage.setItem('theme',newTheme);document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark',newTheme==='dark');};// Apply stored theme on page load
useEffect(()=>{if(theme==='dark'){document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');}else{document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');}},[theme]);// Handle logout
const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');navigate('/auth');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"bg-white dark:bg-gray-900 shadow-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center h-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex-shrink-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-2xl font-bold text-blue-600 dark:text-white",children:"Resume Builder"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",className:"text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 hover:text-blue-500",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/upload",className:"text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 hover:text-blue-500",children:"Upload Resume"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"p-2 rounded-full bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-800",children:theme==='light'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoonIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5 text-gray-700 dark:text-white"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SunIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5 text-yellow-500"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg",children:"Logout"})]})]})})});};export default Navbar;
